name: MechaRock
description:
It came on a day like any other. It bombed all our defences. Now it is digging deeper and deeper into the crust, with the aim of blowing up the core.

Our only hope is something it did not consider - a mech built for building.

If it could build a tower and destroy the spaceship, it could save the day.

- WASD to move

- Space to jump

- J to throw blocks

- S + J to throw downwards, W + J to throw upwards, etc.

IMPORTANT: YOU BEAT THE GAME BY THROWING A BLOCK AT THE SPACESHIP THAT SHOOTS THE MISSILES. THE GAME DOESN’T TELL YOU THIS SINCE I WAS A BIT SHORT ON TIME, BUT PLEASE STOP COMPLAINING THAT IT’S ENDLESS, BECAUSE IT’S NOT.
